metadata.title: Dóri Trainer | Personal Trainer
metadata.description: CrossFit, Olympic weightlifting, women's training, and pre/postnatal fitness with a personal touch.

hero.headline: Stronger body, more confident you
hero.tagline: Personalized training programs for women – with a CrossFit, weightlifting, and pre/postnatal fitness specialist.

benefits.title: Feel stronger & more confident
benefits.description: Build confidence through your body's strength – step by step, at your own pace.

benefits.title: Reduce stress through movement
benefits.description: Exercise is the best stress relief. Find balance through training.

benefits.title: Build muscle safely
benefits.description: We build muscle with mindful, technically precise methods – without injury.

benefits.title: Improve your mobility
benefits.description: Prevent injuries and move freely in your everyday life.

expertise.title: Expertise
expertise.bio: With years of experience and continuous professional development, I help women achieve their fitness goals. Whether it's strength, mobility, or pre/postnatal training – I offer personalized solutions.

areas.title: CrossFit
areas.description: Diverse, high-intensity programs that develop strength, endurance, and coordination.

areas.title: Olympic Weightlifting
areas.description: Snatch and clean & jerk technique coaching from beginner to advanced, with safe progression.

areas.title: Mobility & Strength
areas.description: Range of motion improvement and functional strength development for everyday life.

areas.title: Pre & Postnatal Fitness
areas.description: I'm a certified pre- and postnatal trainer. Safe, effective training programs during and after pregnancy.
